long_description: Agility and toughness combine in the stealth black Cannondale Bad Boy 1 bike, which shifts from urban rides to dirt-road adventures with smooth Shimano components, 30 gears and a shock-absorbent fork. HeadShok Solo DL50 suspension fork provides 50mm of pothole-damping suspension and unique one-legged style. Shimano drivetrain features an SLX Shadow rear derailleur and Deore shifters and front derailleur for 30 easy-spinning gear combinations for any gradient. Magura MT2 hydraulic disc brakes deliver powerful, responsive braking, even in the rain. WTB Freedom Thick Slick tires supply smooth, fast-rolling performance on the pavement. Platform pedals mean no special bike shoes are required-just get on and pedal. Frame eyelets let you outfit the bike with fenders and a rear rack (not included). Specs on the Cannondale Bad Boy 1 bike are subject to change.
